channel.title: Help me, I'm a froob noob
channel.description: This is not a tricky problem.. But.. How do I make a 'perfect' item, one that will make me 1-hit KO anything. I'm new at this, so please be easy one me =S

item.title: Help me, I'm a froob noob
item.dc:creator: @sjustin1996 sjustin1996
item.description:
@sjustin1996 wrote:

There are many tutorials all over the internet about this. I am not willing to help you with such a simple task, only because it’s much longer of a process than it’s simplicity shows. I will let another person help you if they wish.

EDIT: Apologies to moderators for going off-topic.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me, I'm a froob noob

item.title: Help me, I'm a froob noob
item.dc:creator: @theonewhocan theonewhocan
item.description:
@theonewhocan wrote:

[quote=“sjustin1996, post:4, topic:376064”]If you want it to be so only you and your girlfriend could play, and you have portforwarded and all that, you would want to edit your server files near the initialize to, if your playername isn’t “yourplayernamehere” or “yourgirlfriendsplayernamehere” then they will be disconnected.

EDIT: But this is off-topic, make another thread if you want another issue dealt with, or rename this current one.[/quote]
Do you have skype, and I’ll delete this in a little.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me, I'm a froob noob

item.title: Help me, I'm a froob noob
item.dc:creator: @sjustin1996 sjustin1996
item.description:
@sjustin1996 wrote:

If you want it to be so only you and your girlfriend could play, and you have portforwarded and all that, you would want to edit your server files near the initialize to, if your playername isn’t “yourplayernamehere” or “yourgirlfriendsplayernamehere” then they will be disconnected.

EDIT: But this is off-topic, make another thread if you want another issue dealt with, or rename this current one.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me, I'm a froob noob

item.title: Help me, I'm a froob noob
item.dc:creator: @theonewhocan theonewhocan
item.description:
@theonewhocan wrote:

[quote=“gino pieter ferat, post:2, topic:376064”]is it for an 317? look in items.cfg and look for item id 773: the perfect ring.
change all those stats to 50000.
compile>done?[/quote]
Sorry, thanks a lot, but I just taught myself, if you’d like to help me make it to were me and my gf could play, that’d be great (;

Read full topic
